Class Wave

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.waves.Wave
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigAsteroidWave, SmallAsteroidWave, UfoWave
public abstract class Wave extends Object
Represents a wave of spawners in the game. The wave consists of multiple spawners that are summoned in a circular area and can be retracted (removed) when needed. The wave's rarity, size, and spawn radius are defined by the parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • Wave

      public Wave(int waveSize, float radius, Collection<Spawner> spawnerEnvironment)
      Constructs a new wave with the specified parameters. Initializes the random generator, summons collection, and logger.
      Parameters:
      waveSize - the number of spawners to summon
      radius - the radius in which the spawners will be summoned
      spawnerEnvironment - the collection of spawners in the environment where the wave will be added

  • Method Details

    • summon

      public void summon()
      Summons a new set of spawners within a defined radius and adds them to the wave's environment. Each spawner is positioned randomly within the radius.

    • retract

      public void retract()
      Retracts (removes) all summoned spawners by setting their "alive" status to false and clearing the summons collection.

    • getWaveRarity

      public WaveRarity getWaveRarity()
      Gets the rarity of the wave.
      Returns:
      the WaveRarity of the wave

    • setWaveRarity

      public void setWaveRarity(WaveRarity waveRarity)
      Sets the rarity of the wave.
      Parameters:
      waveRarity - the WaveRarity to set for the wave
